nodes.text: "The Muza Disappearances" is a roleplaying game adventure seed for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game, Second Edition from West End Games. The scenario was written by Peter M. Schweighofer for the book Tales of the Jedi Companion, published in 1996.

The scenario sends a group of Jedi Knights to investigate the disappearances of several members of a Muza tribe, camped near the ruins of Kabus-Dabeh. The Jedi track the attacker into a cave, where they discover it to be an intelligent creature known as Togarn. The Jedi neutralize the threat.

The adventure does not specify how the Jedi stop the abductions, suggesting that they may kill Togarn or simply trap him in his cave. The adventure also stipulates that the attacker may be a relative of Togarn's instead, especially if the players had previously played through the adventure "Ruins of Kabus-Dabeh" and killed the monster.
